dn21:1.1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā magadhesu viharati, pācīnato rājagahassa ambasaṇḍā nāma brāhmaṇagāmo, tassuttarato vediyake pabbate indasālaguhāyaṃ.
dn21:1.1.3: Tena kho pana samayena sakkassa devānamindassa ussukkaṃ udapādi bhagavantaṃ dassanāya.
dn21:1.1.5: “kahaṃ nu kho bhagavā etarahi viharati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti?
dn21:1.1.6: Addasā kho sakko devānamindo bhagavantaṃ magadhesu viharantaṃ pācīnato rājagahassa ambasaṇḍā nāma brāhmaṇagāmo, tassuttarato vediyake pabbate indasālaguhāyaṃ.
dn21:1.1.8: “ayaṃ, mārisā, bhagavā magadhesu viharati, pācīnato rājagahassa ambasaṇḍā nāma brāhmaṇagāmo, tassuttarato vediyake pabbate indasālaguhāyaṃ.
dn21:1.1.9: Yadi pana, mārisā, mayaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkameyyāma arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhan”ti?
dn21:1.1.10: “Evaṃ, bhaddantavā”ti kho devā tāvatiṃsā sakkassa devānamindassa paccassosuṃ.
dn21:1.2.1: Atha kho sakko devānamindo pañcasikhaṃ gandhabbadevaputtaṃ āmantesi:
dn21:1.2.2: “ayaṃ, tāta pañcasikha, bhagavā magadhesu viharati pācīnato rājagahassa ambasaṇḍā nāma brāhmaṇagāmo, tassuttarato vediyake pabbate indasālaguhāyaṃ.
dn21:1.2.3: Yadi pana, tāta pañcasikha, mayaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkameyyāma arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhan”ti?
dn21:1.2.4: “Evaṃ, bhaddantavā”ti kho pañcasikho gandhabbadevaputto sakkassa devānamindassa paṭissutvā beluvapaṇḍuvīṇaṃ ādāya sakkassa devānamindassa anucariyaṃ upāgami.
dn21:1.2.5: Atha kho sakko devānamindo devehi tāvatiṃsehi parivuto pañcasikhena gandhabbadevaputtena purakkhato—
dn21:1.2.6: seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya; evameva—devesu tāvatiṃsesu antarahito magadhesu pācīnato rājagahassa ambasaṇḍā nāma brāhmaṇagāmo, tassuttarato vediyake pabbate paccuṭṭhāsi.
dn21:1.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena vediyako pabbato atiriva obhāsajāto hoti ambasaṇḍā ca brāhmaṇagāmo yathā taṃ devānaṃ devānubhāvena.
dn21:1.3.3: “ādittassu nāmajja vediyako pabbato jhāyatisu nāmajja vediyako pabbato jalatisu. Nāmajja vediyako pabbato.
dn21:1.3.4: Kiṃsu nāmajja vediyako pabbato atiriva obhāsajāto ambasaṇḍā ca brāhmaṇagāmo”ti;
dn21:1.4.1: Atha kho sakko devānamindo pañcasikhaṃ gandhabbadevaputtaṃ āmantesi:
dn21:1.4.2: “durupasaṅkamā kho, tāta pañcasikha, tathāgatā mādisena, jhāyī jhānaratā, tadantaraṃ paṭisallīnā.
dn21:1.4.3: Yadi pana tvaṃ, tāta pañcasikha, bhagavantaṃ paṭhamaṃ pasādeyyāsi, tayā, tāta, paṭhamaṃ pasāditaṃ pacchā mayaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkameyyāma arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhan”ti.
dn21:1.4.4: “Evaṃ, bhaddantavā”ti kho pañcasikho gandhabbadevaputto sakkassa devānamindassa paṭissutvā beluvapaṇḍuvīṇaṃ ādāya yena indasālaguhā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā:
dn21:1.4.5: “ettāvatā me bhagavā neva atidūre bhavissati nāccāsanne, saddañca me sossatī”ti—
dn21:1.4.8: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho pañcasikho gandhabbadevaputto beluvapaṇḍuvīṇaṃ assāvesi, imā ca gāthā abhāsi buddhūpasañhitā dhammūpasañhitā saṃghūpasañhitā arahantūpasañhitā kāmūpasañhitā:
dn21:1.6.1: Evaṃ vutte, bhagavā pañcasikhaṃ gandhabbadevaputtaṃ etadavoca:
dn21:1.6.2: “saṃsandati kho te, pañcasikha, tantissaro gītassarena, gītassaro ca tantissarena;
dn21:1.6.3: na ca pana te, pañcasikha, tantissaro gītassaraṃ ativattati, gītassaro ca tantissaraṃ.
dn21:1.6.4: Kadā saṃyūḷhā pana te, pañcasikha, imā gāthā buddhūpasañhitā dhammūpasañhitā saṃghūpasañhitā arahantūpasañhitā kāmūpasañhitā”ti?
dn21:1.6.5: “Ekamidaṃ, bhante, samayaṃ bhagavā uruvelāyaṃ viharati najjā nerañjarāya tīre ajapālanigrodhe paṭhamābhisambuddho.
dn21:1.6.6: Tena kho panāhaṃ, bhante, samayena bhaddā nāma sūriyavacchasā timbaruno gandhabbarañño dhītā, tamabhikaṅkhāmi.
dn21:1.6.7: Sā kho pana, bhante, bhaginī parakāminī hoti;
dn21:1.6.8: sikhaṇḍī nāma mātalissa saṅgāhakassa putto, tamabhikaṅkhati.
dn21:1.6.9: Yato kho ahaṃ, bhante, taṃ bhaginiṃ nālatthaṃ kenaci pariyāyena.
dn21:1.6.10: Athāhaṃ beluvapaṇḍuvīṇaṃ ādāya yena timbaruno gandhabbarañño nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃ; upasaṅkamitvā beluvapaṇḍuvīṇaṃ assāvesiṃ, imā ca gāthā abhāsiṃ buddhūpasañhitā dhammūpasañhitā saṃghūpasañhitā arahantūpasañhitā kāmūpasañhitā—
dn21:1.7.10: Evaṃ vutte, bhante, bhaddā sūriyavacchasā maṃ etadavoca:
dn21:1.7.11: ‘na kho me, mārisa, so bhagavā sammukhā diṭṭho, api ca sutoyeva me so bhagavā devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ sudhammāyaṃ sabhāyaṃ upanaccantiyā.
dn21:1.7.12: Yato kho tvaṃ, mārisa, taṃ bhagavantaṃ kittesi, hotu no ajja samāgamo’ti.
dn21:1.7.13: Soyeva no, bhante, tassā bhaginiyā saddhiṃ samāgamo ahosi.
dn21:1.8.2: “paṭisammodati pañcasikho gandhabbadevaputto bhagavatā, bhagavā ca pañcasikhenā”ti.
dn21:1.8.3: Atha kho sakko devānamindo pañcasikhaṃ gandhabbadevaputtaṃ āmantesi:
dn21:1.8.5: ‘sakko, bhante, devānamindo sāmacco saparijano bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatī’”ti.
dn21:1.8.6: “Evaṃ, bhaddantavā”ti kho pañcasikho gandhabbadevaputto sakkassa devānamindassa paṭissutvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādeti:
dn21:1.8.7: “sakko, bhante, devānamindo sāmacco saparijano bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatī”ti.
dn21:1.8.8: “Evaṃ sukhī hotu, pañcasikha, sakko devānamindo sāmacco saparijano;
dn21:1.8.9: sukhakāmā hi devā manussā asurā nāgā gandhabbā ye caññe santi puthukāyā”ti.
dn21:1.8.10: Evañca pana tathāgatā evarūpe mahesakkhe yakkhe abhivadanti.
dn21:1.8.11: Abhivadito sakko devānamindo bhagavato indasālaguhaṃ pavisitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
dn21:1.8.12: Devāpi tāvatiṃsā indasālaguhaṃ pavisitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
dn21:1.8.13: Pañcasikhopi gandhabbadevaputto indasālaguhaṃ pavisitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
dn21:1.9.1: Tena kho pana samayena indasālaguhā visamā santī samā samapādi, sambādhā santī urundā samapādi, andhakāro guhāyaṃ antaradhāyi, āloko udapādi yathā taṃ devānaṃ devānubhāvena.
dn21:1.9.2: Atha kho bhagavā sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ etadavoca:
dn21:1.9.3: “acchariyamidaṃ āyasmato kosiyassa, abbhutamidaṃ āyasmato kosiyassa tāva bahukiccassa bahukaraṇīyassa yadidaṃ idhāgamanan”ti.
dn21:1.9.4: “Cirapaṭikāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamitukāmo; api ca devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ kehici kehici kiccakaraṇīyehi byāvaṭo; evāhaṃ nāsakkhiṃ bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṃ.
dn21:1.9.5: Ekamidaṃ, bhante, samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati salaḷāgārake.
dn21:1.9.6: Atha khvāhaṃ, bhante, sāvatthiṃ agamāsiṃ bhagavantaṃ dassanāya.
dn21:1.10.1: Tena kho pana, bhante, samayena bhagavā aññatarena samādhinā nisinno hoti, bhūjati ca nāma vessavaṇassa mahārājassa paricārikā bhagavantaṃ paccupaṭṭhitā hoti, pañjalikā namassamānā tiṭṭhati.
dn21:1.10.4: “sakko, bhante, devānamindo sāmacco saparijano bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatī”’ti.
dn21:1.10.5: Evaṃ vutte, bhante, sā bhūjati maṃ etadavoca:
dn21:1.10.8: ‘Tena hi, bhagini, yadā bhagavā tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhito hoti, atha mama vacanena bhagavantaṃ abhivādehi:
dn21:1.10.9: “sakko, bhante, devānamindo sāmacco saparijano bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatī”’ti.
dn21:1.10.10: Kacci me sā, bhante, bhaginī bhagavantaṃ abhivādesi?
dn21:1.10.12: “Abhivādesi maṃ sā, devānaminda, bhaginī, sarāmahaṃ tassā bhaginiyā vacanaṃ.
dn21:1.10.13: Api cāhaṃ āyasmato nemisaddena tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhito”ti.
dn21:1.11.1: “Ye te, bhante, devā amhehi paṭhamataraṃ tāvatiṃsakāyaṃ upapannā, tesaṃ me sammukhā sutaṃ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ:
dn21:1.11.2: ‘yadā tathāgatā loke uppajjanti arahanto sammāsambuddhā, dibbā kāyā paripūrenti, hāyanti asurakāyā’ti.
dn21:1.11.3: Taṃ me idaṃ, bhante, sakkhidiṭṭhaṃ yato tathāgato loke uppanno arahaṃ sammāsambuddho, dibbā kāyā paripūrenti, hāyanti asurakāyāti.
dn21:1.11.5: Idheva, bhante, kapilavatthusmiṃ gopikā nāma sakyadhītā ahosi buddhe pasannā dhamme pasannā saṃghe pasannā sīlesu paripūrakārinī.
dn21:1.11.6: Sā itthittaṃ virājetvā purisattaṃ bhāvetvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapannā.
dn21:1.11.7: Devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ sahabyataṃ amhākaṃ puttattaṃ ajjhupagatā.
dn21:1.11.10: Aññepi, bhante, tayo bhikkhū bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ caritvā hīnaṃ gandhabbakāyaṃ upapannā.
dn21:1.11.11: Te pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitā samaṅgībhūtā paricārayamānā amhākaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ āgacchanti amhākaṃ pāricariyaṃ.
dn21:1.11.12: Te amhākaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ āgate amhākaṃ pāricariyaṃ gopako devaputto paṭicodesi:
dn21:1.11.13: ‘kutomukhā nāma tumhe, mārisā, tassa bhagavato dhammaṃ assuttha—
dn21:1.11.14: ahañhi nāma itthikā samānā buddhe pasannā dhamme pasannā saṃghe pasannā sīlesu paripūrakārinī itthittaṃ virājetvā purisattaṃ bhāvetvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapannā, devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ sahabyataṃ sakkassa devānamindassa puttattaṃ ajjhupagatā.
dn21:1.11.17: Tumhe pana, mārisā, bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ caritvā hīnaṃ gandhabbakāyaṃ upapannā.
dn21:1.11.18: Duddiṭṭharūpaṃ vata bho addasāma, ye mayaṃ addasāma sahadhammike hīnaṃ gandhabbakāyaṃ upapanne’ti.
dn21:1.11.19: Tesaṃ, bhante, gopakena devaputtena paṭicoditānaṃ dve devā diṭṭheva dhamme satiṃ paṭilabhiṃsu kāyaṃ brahmapurohitaṃ, eko pana devo kāme ajjhāvasi.
dn21:1.13.2: “dīgharattaṃ visuddho kho ayaṃ yakkho, yaṃ kiñci maṃ pañhaṃ pucchissati, sabbaṃ taṃ atthasañhitaṃyeva pucchissati, no anatthasañhitaṃ.
dn21:1.13.3: Yañcassāhaṃ puṭṭho byākarissāmi, taṃ khippameva ājānissatī”ti.
dn21:1.13.4: Atha kho bhagavā sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
dn21:2.1.1: Katāvakāso sakko devānamindo bhagavatā imaṃ bhagavantaṃ paṭhamaṃ pañhaṃ apucchi:
dn21:2.1.2: “Kiṃsaṃyojanā nu kho, mārisa, devā manussā asurā nāgā gandhabbā ye caññe santi puthukāyā, te:
dn21:2.1.3: ‘averā adaṇḍā asapattā abyāpajjā viharemu averino’ti iti ca nesaṃ hoti, atha ca pana saverā sadaṇḍā sasapattā sabyāpajjā viharanti saverino”ti?
dn21:2.1.4: Itthaṃ sakko devānamindo bhagavantaṃ pañhaṃ apucchi.
dn21:2.1.6: “Issāmacchariyasaṃyojanā kho, devānaminda, devā manussā asurā nāgā gandhabbā ye caññe santi puthukāyā, te:
dn21:2.1.7: ‘averā adaṇḍā asapattā abyāpajjā viharemu averino’ti iti ca nesaṃ hoti, atha ca pana saverā sadaṇḍā sasapattā sabyāpajjā viharanti saverino”ti.
dn21:2.1.8: Itthaṃ bhagavā sakkassa devānamindassa pañhaṃ puṭṭho byākāsi.
dn21:2.1.9: Attamano sakko devānamindo bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandi anumodi:
dn21:2.1.11: Tiṇṇā mettha kaṅkhā vigatā kathaṅkathā bhagavato pañhaveyyākaraṇaṃ sutvā”ti.
dn21:2.2.1: Itiha sakko devānamindo bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā bhagavantaṃ uttari pañhaṃ apucchi:
dn21:2.2.2: “Issāmacchariyaṃ pana, mārisa, kiṃnidānaṃ kiṃsamudayaṃ kiṃjātikaṃ kiṃpabhavaṃ;
dn21:2.2.5: “Issāmacchariyaṃ kho, devānaminda, piyāppiyanidānaṃ piyāppiyasamudayaṃ piyāppiyajātikaṃ piyāppiyapabhavaṃ;
dn21:2.2.8: “Piyāppiyaṃ pana, mārisa, kiṃnidānaṃ kiṃsamudayaṃ kiṃjātikaṃ kiṃpabhavaṃ;
dn21:2.2.11: “Piyāppiyaṃ kho, devānaminda, chandanidānaṃ chandasamudayaṃ chandajātikaṃ chandapabhavaṃ;
dn21:2.2.14: “Chando pana, mārisa, kiṃnidāno kiṃsamudayo kiṃjātiko kiṃpabhavo;
dn21:2.2.17: “Chando kho, devānaminda, vitakkanidāno vitakkasamudayo vitakkajātiko vitakkapabhavo;
dn21:2.2.20: “Vitakko pana, mārisa, kiṃnidāno kiṃsamudayo kiṃjātiko kiṃpabhavo;
dn21:2.2.23: “Vitakko kho, devānaminda, papañcasaññāsaṅkhānidāno papañcasaññāsaṅkhāsamudayo papañcasaññāsaṅkhājātiko papañcasaññāsaṅkhāpabhavo;
dn21:2.3.1: “Kathaṃ paṭipanno pana, mārisa, bhikkhu papañcasaññāsaṅkhānirodhasāruppagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipanno hotī”ti?
dn21:2.3.9: Somanassampāhaṃ, devānaminda, duvidhena vadāmi sevitabbampi, asevitabbampīti iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ, kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?
dn21:2.3.11: ‘imaṃ kho me somanassaṃ sevato akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyantī’ti, evarūpaṃ somanassaṃ na sevitabbaṃ.
dn21:2.3.13: ‘imaṃ kho me somanassaṃ sevato akusalā dhammā parihāyanti, kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhantī’ti, evarūpaṃ somanassaṃ sevitabbaṃ.
dn21:2.3.14: Tattha yañce savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ, yañce avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ, ye avitakke avicāre, te paṇītatare.
dn21:2.3.15: Somanassampāhaṃ, devānaminda, duvidhena vadāmi sevitabbampi, asevitabbampīti.
dn21:2.3.16: Iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ.
dn21:2.3.17: Domanassampāhaṃ, devānaminda, duvidhena vadāmi sevitabbampi, asevitabbampīti iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ, kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?
dn21:2.3.19: ‘imaṃ kho me domanassaṃ sevato akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyantī’ti, evarūpaṃ domanassaṃ na sevitabbaṃ.
dn21:2.3.21: ‘imaṃ kho me domanassaṃ sevato akusalā dhammā parihāyanti, kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhantī’ti, evarūpaṃ domanassaṃ sevitabbaṃ.
dn21:2.3.22: Tattha yañce savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ, yañce avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ, ye avitakke avicāre, te paṇītatare.
dn21:2.3.23: Domanassampāhaṃ, devānaminda, duvidhena vadāmi sevitabbampi, asevitabbampīti
dn21:2.3.24: iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ.
dn21:2.3.25: Upekkhampāhaṃ, devānaminda, duvidhena vadāmi sevitabbampi, asevitabbampīti iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ, kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?
dn21:2.3.27: ‘imaṃ kho me upekkhaṃ sevato akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyantī’ti, evarūpā upekkhā na sevitabbā.
dn21:2.3.29: ‘imaṃ kho me upekkhaṃ sevato akusalā dhammā parihāyanti, kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhantī’ti, evarūpā upekkhā sevitabbā.
dn21:2.3.30: Tattha yañce savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ, yañce avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ, ye avitakke avicāre, te paṇītatare.
dn21:2.3.31: Upekkhampāhaṃ, devānaminda, duvidhena vadāmi sevitabbampi, asevitabbampīti
dn21:2.3.32: iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ.
dn21:2.3.33: Evaṃ paṭipanno kho, devānaminda, bhikkhu papañcasaññāsaṅkhānirodhasāruppagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipanno hotī”ti.
dn21:2.3.34: Itthaṃ bhagavā sakkassa devānamindassa pañhaṃ puṭṭho byākāsi.
dn21:2.3.35: Attamano sakko devānamindo bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandi anumodi:
dn21:2.3.37: Tiṇṇā mettha kaṅkhā vigatā kathaṅkathā bhagavato pañhaveyyākaraṇaṃ sutvā”ti.
dn21:2.4.1: Itiha sakko devānamindo bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā bhagavantaṃ uttari pañhaṃ apucchi:
dn21:2.4.2: “Kathaṃ paṭipanno pana, mārisa, bhikkhu pātimokkhasaṃvarāya paṭipanno hotī”ti?
dn21:2.4.9: Kāyasamācārampāhaṃ, devānaminda, duvidhena vadāmi sevitabbampi asevitabbampīti iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ, kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?
dn21:2.4.11: ‘imaṃ kho me kāyasamācāraṃ sevato akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyantī’ti, evarūpo kāyasamācāro na sevitabbo.
dn21:2.4.13: ‘imaṃ kho me kāyasamācāraṃ sevato akusalā dhammā parihāyanti, kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhantī’ti, evarūpo kāyasamācāro sevitabbo.
dn21:2.4.16: iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ.
dn21:2.4.18: sevitabbampi, asevitabbampīti iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ, kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?
dn21:2.4.19: Tattha yaṃ jaññā vacīsamācāraṃ ‘imaṃ kho me vacīsamācāraṃ sevato akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyantī’ti, evarūpo vacīsamācāro na sevitabbo.
dn21:2.4.20: Tattha yaṃ jaññā vacīsamācāraṃ ‘imaṃ kho me vacīsamācāraṃ sevato akusalā dhammā parihāyanti, kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhantī’ti, evarūpo vacīsamācāro sevitabbo.
dn21:2.4.23: iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ.
dn21:2.4.25: sevitabbampi, asevitabbampīti iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ, kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?
dn21:2.4.26: Tattha yaṃ jaññā pariyesanaṃ ‘imaṃ kho me pariyesanaṃ sevato akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyantī’ti, evarūpā pariyesanā na sevitabbā.
dn21:2.4.27: Tattha yaṃ jaññā pariyesanaṃ ‘imaṃ kho me pariyesanaṃ sevato akusalā dhammā parihāyanti, kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhantī’ti, evarūpā pariyesanā sevitabbā.
dn21:2.4.30: iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ.
dn21:2.4.31: Evaṃ paṭipanno kho, devānaminda, bhikkhu pātimokkhasaṃvarāya paṭipanno hotī”ti.
dn21:2.4.32: Itthaṃ bhagavā sakkassa devānamindassa pañhaṃ puṭṭho byākāsi.
dn21:2.4.33: Attamano sakko devānamindo bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandi anumodi:
dn21:2.4.35: Tiṇṇā mettha kaṅkhā vigatā kathaṅkathā bhagavato pañhaveyyākaraṇaṃ sutvā”ti.
dn21:2.5.1: Itiha sakko devānamindo bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā bhagavantaṃ uttari pañhaṃ apucchi:
dn21:2.5.2: “Kathaṃ paṭipanno pana, mārisa, bhikkhu indriyasaṃvarāya paṭipanno hotī”ti?
dn21:2.5.15: Evaṃ vutte, sakko devānamindo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
dn21:2.5.16: “Imassa kho ahaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmi.
dn21:2.5.17: Yathārūpaṃ, bhante, cakkhuviññeyyaṃ rūpaṃ sevato akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, evarūpaṃ cakkhuviññeyyaṃ rūpaṃ na sevitabbaṃ.
dn21:2.5.18: Yathārūpañca kho, bhante, cakkhuviññeyyaṃ rūpaṃ sevato akusalā dhammā parihāyanti, kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, evarūpaṃ cakkhuviññeyyaṃ rūpaṃ sevitabbaṃ.
dn21:2.5.19: Yathārūpañca kho, bhante, sotaviññeyyaṃ saddaṃ sevato …pe…
dn21:2.5.23: manoviññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ sevato akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, evarūpo manoviññeyyo dhammo na sevitabbo.
dn21:2.5.24: Yathārūpañca kho, bhante, manoviññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ sevato akusalā dhammā parihāyanti, kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, evarūpo manoviññeyyo dhammo sevitabbo.
dn21:2.5.25: Imassa kho me, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena atthaṃ ājānato
dn21:2.5.26: tiṇṇā mettha kaṅkhā vigatā kathaṅkathā bhagavato pañhaveyyākaraṇaṃ sutvā”ti.
dn21:2.6.1: Itiha sakko devānamindo bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā bhagavantaṃ uttari pañhaṃ apucchi:
dn21:2.6.2: “Sabbeva nu kho, mārisa, samaṇabrāhmaṇā ekantavādā ekantasīlā ekantachandā ekantaajjhosānā”ti?
dn21:2.6.3: “Na kho, devānaminda, sabbe samaṇabrāhmaṇā ekantavādā ekantasīlā ekantachandā ekantaajjhosānā”ti.
dn21:2.6.4: “Kasmā pana, mārisa, na sabbe samaṇabrāhmaṇā ekantavādā ekantasīlā ekantachandā ekantaajjhosānā”ti?
dn21:2.6.6: Tasmiṃ anekadhātunānādhātusmiṃ loke yaṃ yadeva sattā dhātuṃ abhinivisanti, taṃ tadeva thāmasā parāmāsā abhinivissa voharanti:
dn21:2.6.8: Tasmā na sabbe samaṇabrāhmaṇā ekantavādā ekantasīlā ekantachandā ekantaajjhosānā”ti.
dn21:2.6.9: “Sabbeva nu kho, mārisa, samaṇabrāhmaṇā accantaniṭṭhā accantayogakkhemī accantabrahmacārī accantapariyosānā”ti?
dn21:2.6.10: “Na kho, devānaminda, sabbe samaṇabrāhmaṇā accantaniṭṭhā accantayogakkhemī accantabrahmacārī accantapariyosānā”ti.
dn21:2.6.11: “Kasmā pana, mārisa, na sabbe samaṇabrāhmaṇā accantaniṭṭhā accantayogakkhemī accantabrahmacārī accantapariyosānā”ti?
dn21:2.6.12: “Ye kho, devānaminda, bhikkhū taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttā te accantaniṭṭhā accantayogakkhemī accantabrahmacārī accantapariyosānā.
dn21:2.6.13: Tasmā na sabbe samaṇabrāhmaṇā accantaniṭṭhā accantayogakkhemī accantabrahmacārī accantapariyosānā”ti.
dn21:2.6.14: Itthaṃ bhagavā sakkassa devānamindassa pañhaṃ puṭṭho byākāsi.
dn21:2.6.15: Attamano sakko devānamindo bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandi anumodi:
dn21:2.6.17: Tiṇṇā mettha kaṅkhā vigatā kathaṅkathā bhagavato pañhaveyyākaraṇaṃ sutvā”ti.
dn21:2.6.18: Itiha sakko devānamindo bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
dn21:2.7.1: “Ejā, bhante, rogo, ejā gaṇḍo, ejā sallaṃ, ejā imaṃ purisaṃ parikaḍḍhati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiyā.
dn21:2.7.3: Yesāhaṃ, bhante, pañhānaṃ ito bahiddhā aññesu samaṇabrāhmaṇesu okāsakammampi nālatthaṃ, te me bhagavatā byākatā.
dn21:2.7.4: Dīgharattānusayitañca pana me vicikicchākathaṃkathāsallaṃ, tañca bhagavatā abbuḷhan”ti.
dn21:2.7.5: “Abhijānāsi no tvaṃ, devānaminda, ime pañhe aññe samaṇabrāhmaṇe pucchitā”ti?
dn21:2.7.6: “Abhijānāmahaṃ, bhante, ime pañhe aññe samaṇabrāhmaṇe pucchitā”ti.
dn21:2.7.7: “Yathā kathaṃ pana te, devānaminda, byākaṃsu? Sace te agaru bhāsassū”ti.
dn21:2.7.8: “Na kho me, bhante, garu yatthassa bhagavā nisinno bhagavantarūpo vā”ti.
dn21:2.7.10: “Yesvāhaṃ, bhante, maññāmi samaṇabrāhmaṇā āraññikā pantasenāsanāti, tyāhaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ime pañhe pucchāmi, te mayā puṭṭhā na sampāyanti, asampāyantā mamaṃyeva paṭipucchanti:
dn21:2.7.15: ‘kiṃ panāyasmā, devānaminda, kammaṃ katvā imaṃ ṭhānaṃ patto’ti?
dn21:2.7.18: ‘sakko ca no devānamindo diṭṭho, yañca no apucchimhā, tañca no byākāsī’ti.
dn21:2.7.19: Te aññadatthu mamaṃyeva sāvakā sampajjanti, na cāhaṃ tesaṃ.
dn21:2.7.20: Ahaṃ kho pana, bhante, bhagavato sāvako sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo”ti.
dn21:2.7.22: “Abhijānāsi no tvaṃ, devānaminda, ito pubbe evarūpaṃ vedapaṭilābhaṃ somanassapaṭilābhan”ti?
dn21:2.7.23: “Abhijānāmahaṃ, bhante, ito pubbe evarūpaṃ vedapaṭilābhaṃ somanassapaṭilābhan”ti.
dn21:2.7.24: “Yathā kathaṃ pana tvaṃ, devānaminda, abhijānāsi ito pubbe evarūpaṃ vedapaṭilābhaṃ somanassapaṭilābhan”ti?
dn21:2.7.26: Tasmiṃ kho pana, bhante, saṅgāme devā jiniṃsu, asurā parājayiṃsu.
dn21:2.7.27: Tassa mayhaṃ, bhante, taṃ saṅgāmaṃ abhivijinitvā vijitasaṅgāmassa etadahosi:
dn21:2.7.28: ‘yā ceva dāni dibbā ojā yā ca asurā ojā, ubhayametaṃ devā paribhuñjissantī’ti.
dn21:2.7.29: So kho pana me, bhante, vedapaṭilābho somanassapaṭilābho sadaṇḍāvacaro sasatthāvacaro na nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya saṃvattati.
dn21:2.7.30: Yo kho pana me ayaṃ, bhante, bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā vedapaṭilābho somanassapaṭilābho, so adaṇḍāvacaro asatthāvacaro ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattatī”ti.
dn21:2.8.1: “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ, devānaminda, atthavasaṃ sampassamāno evarūpaṃ vedapaṭilābhaṃ somanassapaṭilābhaṃ pavedesī”ti?
dn21:2.8.2: “Cha kho ahaṃ, bhante, atthavase sampassamāno evarūpaṃ vedapaṭilābhaṃ somanassapaṭilābhaṃ pavedemi.
dn21:2.8.7: Imaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhante, paṭhamaṃ atthavasaṃ sampassamāno evarūpaṃ vedapaṭilābhaṃ somanassapaṭilābhaṃ pavedemi.
dn21:2.8.12: Imaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhante, dutiyaṃ atthavasaṃ sampassamāno evarūpaṃ vedapaṭilābhaṃ somanassapaṭilābhaṃ pavedemi.
dn21:2.8.17: Imaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhante, tatiyaṃ atthavasaṃ sampassamāno evarūpaṃ vedapaṭilābhaṃ somanassapaṭilābhaṃ pavedemi.
dn21:2.8.22: Imaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhante, catutthaṃ atthavasaṃ sampassamāno evarūpaṃ vedapaṭilābhaṃ somanassapaṭilābhaṃ pavedemi.
dn21:2.8.27: Imaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhante, pañcamaṃ atthavasaṃ sampassamāno evarūpaṃ vedapaṭilābhaṃ somanassapaṭilābhaṃ pavedemi.
dn21:2.8.32: Imaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhante, chaṭṭhaṃ atthavasaṃ sampassamāno evarūpaṃ vedapaṭilābhaṃ somanassapaṭilābhaṃ pavedemi.
dn21:2.8.33: Ime kho ahaṃ, bhante, cha atthavase sampassamāno evarūpaṃ vedapaṭilābhaṃ somanassapaṭilābhaṃ pavedemi.
dn21:2.10.1: Atha kho sakko devānamindo pañcasikhaṃ gandhabbaputtaṃ āmantesi:
dn21:2.10.2: “bahūpakāro kho mesi tvaṃ, tāta pañcasikha, yaṃ tvaṃ bhagavantaṃ paṭhamaṃ pasādesi.
dn21:2.10.3: Tayā, tāta, paṭhamaṃ pasāditaṃ pacchā mayaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamimhā arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ.
dn21:2.10.4: Pettike vā ṭhāne ṭhapayissāmi, gandhabbarājā bhavissasi, bhaddañca te sūriyavacchasaṃ dammi, sā hi te abhipatthitā”ti.
dn21:2.10.5: Atha kho sakko devānamindo pāṇinā pathaviṃ parāmasitvā tikkhattuṃ udānaṃ udānesi:
dn21:2.10.9: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne sakkassa devānamindassa virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi:
dn21:2.10.12: iti ye sakkena devānamindena ajjhiṭṭhapañhā puṭṭhā, te bhagavatā byākatā.
